message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $900000. What do you think?

I'm interested in the product, but $900000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to pay a premium for a great product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm confident this product will bring you significant value. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $850000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $825000. I think that's the minimum I can accept to make this deal worthwhile for me. I'm willing to meet you at $825000, but I need to get closer to my minimum

I appreciate your flexibility, but $825000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $800000, which is my maximum budget. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
